original_text: And he put upon him the coat, and girded him with the girdle, and clothed him with the robe, and put the ephod upon him, and he girded him with the curious girdle of the ephod, and bound it unto him therewith.
korean_text: 아론에게 속옷을 입히며 띠를 띠우고 겉옷을 입히며 에봇을 걸쳐 입히고 에봇의 장식 띠를 띠워서 에봇을 몸에 매고

sentences.original_text: And he put upon him the coat
and girded him with the girdle
and clothed him with the robe
and put the ephod upon him
and he girded him with the curious girdle of the ephod
and bound it unto him therewith
